title: Map of Runeterra?
body:
I've just started researching into the lore behind LoL for a project I wanted to work on and need to know where certain key locations within Runeterra are, however discovered that there aren't any reliable large-scale maps to assist (at least not any I could find).

I was hoping that someone might have more insight on how where each location is in relation to others in the revised lore, or perhaps there's a kind Rioter lurking about that could fill in the gaps.

replies.body:
To my knowledge there is no current map of Runeterra proper.

This is the most recent map released:
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/37/Runeterra_Map_01.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170308222904
it doesn't show everything, but it's better than nothing and gives a good idea of where Piltover/Zaun/Shurima/Noxus/Bilgewater are.

And we know that the Shadow Isles are closest to Bilgewater, meaning that they are likely the most eastern part of Runeterra.

It'd be safe enough to assume that the Freljiord is the most northern country on the landmass, _(seeming its snowy and Riot is based in the northern hemisphere, so they would likely associate snow with north.)_

I believe that Shurima and Targon are central to the landmass, and likely border eachother as Deserts are usually formed from close proximity to mountain ranges. And from Taric's story, I'm guessing that Demacia either borders on, or is close to Targon. 
_(but don't trust me on that)_

We know from Taliyah's story that Noxus, Shurima, Ionia and the Freliord are costal, or at least some parts are.

and I believe that Zaun and PIltover are geographically in the same place, one is essentially the slums of the other.

I hope thats at least a little bit helpful!

Don't trust me 100% though. Its hard to piece together a picture from all the fragmented and conflicting lore around. Hopefully when the universe is fleshed out a bit, all the holes 
will be covered.

Good luck! :)

I did come across that map, however dismissed it because it didn't seem to contain the most important information I needed. *However*, on closer inspection it appears that map has more information than I originally thought. For example, it appears that the southern tip of Ionia can be seen in the top right corner.

[This](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/37/Runeterra_Map_01.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/2000?cb=20161202020807) is the copy I'm currently looking at, which seems to be 10 times larger than the copy you linked.

If we look to the west edge of the map, we can see indications of Demacia and the Freljord, and it appears that the Freljord is actually *south* of Demacia, which is quite interesting.

Another point of some interest is some writing just to the east of Noxus, says something along the lines of "Khooran(?) Iron Pinnacle, Ere(?)" from what I can tell.

Unfortunately, it still doesn't contain enough information for my purposes. I suppose I could try asking one of the Rioters directly, but I doubt I'd get the information I need.

Yea I think you're right, there are a lot of clues in the map, that don't give us certainties, but can give us more of the general view than we thought.

Yes i see what you mean about Demacia and the Freljord, i completely missed that.
Thats weird the the freljord is below Demacia.
Perhaps what the map means is that the river leads to the freljord (from one of the glaciers perhaps?), not that the freljord is actually directly west of the map? Who can say.


Yea I doubt Riot would give out such information, just incase they decide to change it later for the release of a new story/champion.
But its worth a try.

Huh haven't seen HeartVine post in ages.

Sorry can't help with this really.
I'd say Riot probably needs to retool their map since all the lore rework.

Comments quite a bit, posts not so much.

As far as the map, given they just redid a whole bunch of their worldbuilding lore, I'd imagine around now would be an excellent time to redo some of the basic lore centrepieces like maps. I can dream anyway.

Not an official map, but this one is more recent and detailed than any of the official ones I know of: 
http://i.imgur.com/1MUGN2D.jpg[/img]

Not too sure how accurate it is, but from the official maps that do exist and the hints in the lore it all seems to line up pretty well as far as I can see.
Unfortunately, this map seems to be highly inaccurate considering the official map released by Riot (the one Lord Sess linked), so it's not of much use to me. Thanks for trying, though.
I'll be honest, I couldn't find a readable copy of the one Sess linked to compare them :P Good luck with your project :)
